experience.title: Front End Web Developer
experience.description: A multichannel marketing company that provided me the opportunity to grow on a Kanban team of 5 developers. Worked on all channels of the business building websites to facilitate marketing offers for magazines, products, and services with clients such as Spotify, eBay, Overstock, Ticketmaster, Delta, United, JetBlue, and others.
experience.tech: React, Redux, Webpack, Angular 4+, Git, Gulp, Google Analytics, SCSS, AWS S3, PayPal, Spotify OAuth, REST API, SQL, EJS.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: 9 to 5 boot camp (that often went until 9 pm) that taught fundamentals of full stack development. This course gave me a solid foundation from where my skills grew exponentially. Through coding homework and weekly assignments, I was challenged to learn every second.
experience.tech: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Git, jQuery, Angular 1, Node.js, Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Heroku

experience.title: Head Swim Coach
experience.description: I coached various teams in New York, Ohio, and California. Ages of athletes ranged from 4 years to 24 years old with abilities from learning to swim, to competing at High School and NCAA Championship levels. During this time, I learned web development on my own using Free Code Camp and Code Academy while also managing a Wordpress site for one team I was coaching.
experience.tech: HTML, Javascript, CSS, Wordpress, Leadership, Marketing, Organization

experience.title: Student - Athlete
experience.description: Four-year varsity swimmer. Studied to become a swim coach. I took four semesters worth of Computer Science courses. Didn't realize it was a path I wanted to pursue until later.
experience.tech: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Java, Python, Communications, Pottery, Swimming
